lead_paragraph: The British Olympic Association (BOA) has issued a fresh Zika virus advisory to national governing bodies of sport to reflect changed government advice ahead of the Rio Games in August.

headline.print_headline: BOA Issues Zika Update to Sports Bodies
headline.main: BOA Issues Zika Update to Sports Bodies
